title: Blog: The Complex Emotions Bangladesh And Its Crisis Evoke In Me, An Indian
content: Alongside the term 'ghuspaithiye' and the range of emotions it evokes, there is a mix of empathy, pain, shared legacy, and a common love for Rabindra Sangeet - all experienced in varying degrees and at different times.
summary: Alongside the term 'ghuspaithiye' and the range of emotions it evokes, there is a mix of empathy, pain, shared legacy, and a common love for Rabindra Sangeet - all experienced in varying degrees and at different times.

title: Tom Cruise To Perform Deadly Stunts For Paris Olympics Closing Ceremony
content: Two weeks after the unprecedented complexity of the opening ceremony along the River Seine, there are big expectations for the show to wrap up the Games.
summary: Two weeks after the unprecedented complexity of the opening ceremony along the River Seine, there are big expectations for the show to wrap up the Games.

title: World's Cities Are Growing Upward Than Outward, Says Satellite Study
content: Cities are increasingly growing upward instead of outward, with Asian cities leading the way. Previously, cities expanded by occupying more territory.
summary: Cities are increasingly growing upward instead of outward, with Asian cities leading the way. Previously, cities expanded by occupying more territory.

title: TikTok Maker ByteDance Launch Text-To-Video AI App, Rivals OpenAI's Sora
content: The launch of a text-to-video model by the parent of short video app firm TikTok follows a series of similar model releases in recent months in China.
summary: The launch of a text-to-video model by the parent of short video app firm TikTok follows a series of similar model releases in recent months in China.

title: "Attacking Temples, Parliament...": Sheikh Hasina's Son On Bangladesh Turmoil
content: Bangladesh's former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina son has expressed concern over the attacks on his mother's party leaders and minorities in the country amid massive political turmoil.
summary: Bangladesh's former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina son has expressed concern over the attacks on his mother's party leaders and minorities in the country amid massive political turmoil.

title: Elon Musk's X Sues Group Over "Illegal" Ad Boycott That Cost Billions
content: Elon Musk's X Corp. filed a lawsuit accusing an industry group of violating antitrust laws for an advertising boycott that cost the social media company billions of dollars.
summary: Elon Musk's X Corp. filed a lawsuit accusing an industry group of violating antitrust laws for an advertising boycott that cost the social media company billions of dollars.

title: NASA Delays SpaceX ISS Mission As Boeing Starliner Faces Issues
content: NASA on Tuesday postponed the departure of astronauts bound for the International Space Station on a SpaceX flight due to ongoing issues with Boeing's Starliner spacecraft.
summary: NASA on Tuesday postponed the departure of astronauts bound for the International Space Station on a SpaceX flight due to ongoing issues with Boeing's Starliner spacecraft.

title: "Don't Stain Dreams": Bangladesh Band After Singer Home, Instruments Burnt
content: Rahul Ananda and his family members managed to escape unharmed, but a huge number of musical instruments were reduced to ash as rioters set fire to the house.
summary: Rahul Ananda and his family members managed to escape unharmed, but a huge number of musical instruments were reduced to ash as rioters set fire to the house.

title: 20 Leaders Of Sheikh Hasina's Party Found Dead As Bangladesh Protests Continue
content: Twenty bodies of Awami League leaders have been found across Bangladesh after ex Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina left the nation, following violent protests by students over giving job quota to freedom fighters' children. Hindus have been targetted too.
summary: Twenty bodies of Awami League leaders have been found across Bangladesh after ex Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina left the nation, following violent protests by students over giving job quota to freedom fighters' children. Hindus have been targetted too.

title: Namal Rajapaksa Announced As Candidate For Sri Lankan Presidency
content: Namal Rajapaksa, the 38-year-old heir to the Rajapaksa dynasty, was on Wednesday named as the SLPP candidate for the presidential election, thus officially ending Rajapaksa family's backing to the incumbent Ranil Wickremesinghe.
summary: Namal Rajapaksa, the 38-year-old heir to the Rajapaksa dynasty, was on Wednesday named as the SLPP candidate for the presidential election, thus officially ending Rajapaksa family's backing to the incumbent Ranil Wickremesinghe.

title: 9 People Trapped As Hotel Collapses In Germany
content: Rescue efforts have proven to be extremely complex, according to a police statement. According to regional broadcaster SWR, emergency services have been unable to enter the building because of the risk of further collapse.
summary: Rescue efforts have proven to be extremely complex, according to a police statement. According to regional broadcaster SWR, emergency services have been unable to enter the building because of the risk of further collapse.

title: Kamala Harris' Vice Presidential Pick's History With China May Prove Awkward
content: Democratic vice presidential candidate Tim Walz has connections to China dating back decades that could help inform Kamala Harris's approach to the world's second-biggest economy.
summary: Democratic vice presidential candidate Tim Walz has connections to China dating back decades that could help inform Kamala Harris's approach to the world's second-biggest economy.

title: Egyptians May Have Used Hydraulic Lift To Build Pyramid, New Study Reveals
content: A new theory suggests that ancient Egyptians may have used a hydraulic lift system to build the Step Pyramid of Djoser, the oldest pyramid in Egypt.
summary: A new theory suggests that ancient Egyptians may have used a hydraulic lift system to build the Step Pyramid of Djoser, the oldest pyramid in Egypt.

title: In Latest Attack, Trump's Son Eric Calls Meghan Markle "Spoiled Apple"
content: Eric Trump, the son of former US President Donald Trump, has expressed his disdain for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, suggesting his father may deport the couple, should he win the US presidential election come November.
summary: Eric Trump, the son of former US President Donald Trump, has expressed his disdain for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle, suggesting his father may deport the couple, should he win the US presidential election come November.

title: Bangladesh Army Refused To Suppress Protest, Sealing Sheikh Hasina's Fate
content: The night before long-time leader Sheikh Hasina abruptly fled Bangladesh amid deadly protests, her army chief held a meeting with his generals and decided that troops would not open fire on civilians to enforce a curfew.
summary: The night before long-time leader Sheikh Hasina abruptly fled Bangladesh amid deadly protests, her army chief held a meeting with his generals and decided that troops would not open fire on civilians to enforce a curfew.

title: Yahya Sinwar: New Hamas Leader, Also Referred As "Dead Man Walking"
content: After a career in the shadows, spent in Israeli prisons and the internal security apparatus of Hamas, Yahya Sinwar has emerged as leader of the Palestinian group in the middle of a full-blown war.
summary: After a career in the shadows, spent in Israeli prisons and the internal security apparatus of Hamas, Yahya Sinwar has emerged as leader of the Palestinian group in the middle of a full-blown war.

title: Bangladesh Hindu Homes Targeted As Mobs Run Amok After Sheikh Hasina Exit
content: Scores of Hindu temples, business establishments and temples in Bangladesh have been attacked by violent mobs after Sheikh Hasina was ousted as Prime Minister, according to a community association.
summary: Scores of Hindu temples, business establishments and temples in Bangladesh have been attacked by violent mobs after Sheikh Hasina was ousted as Prime Minister, according to a community association.

title: Who Is Asif Merchant, Pak Man Arrested For Plot To Kill Donald Trump
content: The US has charged a Pakistani man, who allegedly has ties to Iran, with attempting to carry out assassinations of American politicians.

title: "Let's Win This": How Kamala Harris Chose Tim Walz Over Phone Call
content: Tim Walz, 60, is a veteran of the Army National Guard and a former high school social studies teacher and football coach.

title: US Names Bald Eagle As National Bird, 200 Years After It Became Its Symbol
content: The bald eagle was specifically chosen by America's Founding Fathers since it is a native of the region.
